column4: What do you guys feel is the overall best browser, firefox chrome or other
I like chrome, I used to use firefox and I know this is going to sound stupid but I stopped using it when they started advancing a major version point like every other week
i like chrome, but i cannot tell if its my imagination or what, but it seems firefox completely loads the website faster where chrome loads the majority faster but takes longer to completely load
hm yeah I haven't really noticed either way. I do like firefox's plugin system better. Chrome still seems to lack there. I know they've got the market but it seems more geared for games and stuff
